Reviews.Title: Quality for the Price
Reviews.Author: Hungry Smarf
Reviews.Content: While I have some issues with this product, I'm fairly certain that I am the one at fault; my biggest issue has been blurry pictures of "still life." My hand may just be shaking, though.In all, the camera is good for the unadvanced like myself who just wish to take photos. There are a plethora of settings that are fun to play around with, and the pictures generally come out with great quality. The price is certainly good for what you get.The camera is small enough to tote around and easy enough to use for those spontaneous, spur of the moment photographs!

Reviews.Title: What I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: My first digital camera.  Has way too many features for me, and I think a complicated menu if you get into all the functions.  But I'm a first digital camera user.  The quality of picture, I was amazed, and the zoom is great.  I've had it 1 month and still playing with it, but all my pictures are very good quality and the color is right on, and that's just on automatic.  Many things you can do with this camera, price is unbeatable!  Didn't give the full 5 stars because the menu goes on and on for functions I'll never use.  I was surprised you can do video with it too, it even has a mike!  Hollywood, here I come!!  Bought a case (red to match) separately from Amazon too, good  fit.  (Roocase -flamming red- Olympus FE-47 14MP digital camera red).

Reviews.Title: quality in olympus cameras
Reviews.Author: dtocz24
Reviews.Content: i got a great deal on this camera on amazon.com and am so pleased with my purchase. i went back to an olympus from a nikon b/c of the quality of the pictures. plus this camera has alot of cool features as well.

Reviews.Title: WORST CAMERA FROM OLYMPUS
Reviews.Author: Maria One "dare devil"
Reviews.Content: I have been taking pictures using Olympus cameras since the '60s, on their half frame 35mm (72 exposures) automatic.  I also admire their cameras to get great pictures.  The later Stylus film cameras were just as good with more features packed into small packages, and best of all, they were never expensive to own.  C-50 took great pictures too.  My last camera was a SP-320 7-megapixel with enter level video, and the pictures were clear and sharp in all conditions.  So I was glad that Olympus had been holding up its tradition.  That is until I bought this FE-47 pocket 14MP point and shoot.  What a lousy camera!The pictures are bad and grainy even on bright day light.  Indoor on a day time is bad enough.  When you choose the shake compensation mode, then you cannot choose other shooting mode at the same time, rendering all others unless.  The pictures look like a 1MP cheap cameras of the late '90s.  The only decent pictures are portraits taken 5 feet away.  Anything farther than 10 feet, good luck.People complain of its battery life of only about 20 shots, but I think you have to choose Ni-MH on the Setup last entry to tell the camera to expect 1.25 volts instead of 1.5 volts of alkaline voltage, so that the camera won't tell you the battery is empty.  By all means using rechargeable Ni-MH or Lithium-Ion AA, and forget about alkaline battery.I do not like the camera has no one button movie mode because you have to scroll through the top menu to find the movie camera, and it is too slow to take fast movie clips.I am going to sell this FE-47 for a loss and move on.  Its bright red color body still would attract users who want brilliant colors on the camera rather than the accurate and sharp colors on the pictures.Stay away from FE-47.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: baby
Reviews.Content: So far this camera is a great little camera.I do enjoy it.I would definitly buy another one.S

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: cburger
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this product to long or used it to often.  I bought as a replacement for a Nikon which broke.  I like the small cameras that I can keep in my purse to have handy at all times.  This is a nice camera takes good pictures.  I will more than likely give it to my teenager for her use and look for something just a bit better for me.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Debra
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  One thing I didn't realize is that it uses AA batteries and they don't last long.  A nice thing about the batteries though, is you can go anywhere and buy them and they will be charged.  You can also keep extra ones with you in your camera bag.  That is what I do; I also use rechargeable ones.  I don't like the software it comes with, it isn't user friendly and I haven't tried any other one yet to see if it is compatible.  Overall I am happy you just have to be prepared with extra batteries and you'll be fine.  I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: A good little camera, but....
Reviews.Author: Linwood H. Snell Jr.
Reviews.Content: I definitely like the camera. Though others have indicated a short battery life, I have not found that to be the case. I had hoped for a little clearer picture at max zoom (5X), but prints tend to come out a bit grainy. For most shots though, the camera is a good value and I do not regret buying it at all.

Reviews.Title: Impressed with quality
Reviews.Author: oklahomatumbleweed "DKM"
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the quality of the camera. It was easy to set up. The only drawback I found was the position of the battery cover. It is opposite the buttons for shooting. On occasion when I was shooting, my thumb would compress the battery cover button and accidently popped out the batteries. Now that I am aware of it, I have learned to keep my thumb away, but I have to explain to everyone that uses it. The camera is a little weightier that my previous cameras. However, I like the software program that allows quick downloads and tagging of picures. The tags can be face recognition, GPS position, titles, and events. I would recommend this camera to others. It  is easy for non-techies.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY
Reviews.Author: D. Gittens "WONDERFUL"
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY FIRST CAMERA,ACTUALLY MY HUSBAND PICKED IT FOR ME.PICTURES ARE GREAT SO FAR VERY PLEASE WITH MY CAMERA.WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO MY FRIENDS.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Ward "bjward99"
Reviews.Content: I am sure the camera would have worked as described.  The camera was very inexpensive and the look and feel were too cheap.  I returned it without trying out the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel resolution for high-quality, poster-size prints
5x optical zoom
AF tracking; Intelligent Auto
Advanced Face Detection and Creative Art Filters
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-47 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Red)
